Articles.Content:
Hello all,

Getlicked here, i am a gamer and streamer i will be streaming kerbal space program on twitch you can find me at [http://twitch.tv/getlicked](http://twitch.tv/getlicked) 10am till 5pm GMT.

I am still new to the game so some help and tips would be really great. 

I would just like to say a big hello to everyone and feel free to come to my stream as i love a good chat.

Thank you

Getlicked

Hello, getlicked, and welcome to the forums!

I look forward to seeing your stream. As far as help and tips go, the [Gameplay Questions and Tutorials section](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/15-Gameplay-Questions-and-Tutorials) has a wealth of valuable information for both the new player and the seasoned pro. If you want to know how to do some common task you will probably find a tutorial for it in the Tutorials subsection. If you have a specific question about how to accomplish a task, post a thread in the Gameplay Questions section that I linked to.

There are also numerous useful resources in [the Wiki](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Main_Page).

That should help get you started.

See you around and happy landings!
Welcome aboard! Starhawk's already put up the most relevant links, and I can tell you from experience that they help tremendously.
Welcome Getlicked! Hope to seeing more of your vids.
Hello all! I'm new too. I'm from Thailand.

Thanks for the replys guys , stream went well yesterday with a lot of people helping me out . Also I would like to thank the official ksp tv for hosting me.

Cheers

GetLicked
